faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Facturly and how it can transform your invoicing in Africa

whatIs.question: What is Facturly and who is it for?
whatIs.answer: Facturly is the mobile-first invoicing platform designed specifically for entrepreneurs and small businesses in West Africa. Whether you're a freelancer, consultant, SME or startup, Facturly lets you create and send invoices in 60 seconds, via WhatsApp (the preferred channel in Africa), and receive payments via mobile money (Orange Money, MTN, Wave, etc.). Perfect for those who want to invoice quickly without complexity.

emailSending.question: How does WhatsApp invoice sending work?
emailSending.answer: It's simple: you create your invoice, click 'Send via WhatsApp', and your client receives a WhatsApp message with a secure link. They can view the invoice, accept it and pay directly via mobile money, all from their phone. The system automatically tracks the invoice status and notifies you as soon as a payment is received. WhatsApp is the primary communication channel in Africa with 70%+ penetration, which is why we've chosen it as the main channel.

integrations.question: Can I integrate Facturly with my existing tools?
integrations.answer: Yes! Facturly offers integrations with the most popular accounting tools. Our API also allows you to connect Facturly to your existing system. We're constantly working to add new integrations to make your workflow easier.

freePlan.question: Is it really free?
freePlan.answer: Yes, creating invoices is 100% free and unlimited. You only pay at the time of sending (via the credit system). It's ideal for testing the tool without any risk.

credits.question: How do credits work?
credits.answer: Facturly uses a credit system: you buy credits individually or in packs (Starter, Pro, Business). Each invoice sent consumes 1 credit. Credits remain valid until used. No recurring subscription: you only buy when you need them. Pay via mobile money (Orange Money, MTN, Wave, etc.).

onlinePayment.question: How does mobile money payment work?
onlinePayment.answer: When a client accepts an invoice, they can pay it directly via mobile money (Orange Money, MTN, Wave, Moov Money, etc.) by clicking on the payment link in the WhatsApp message. Payments are processed securely via Moneroo and you are notified instantly. The invoice is automatically marked as paid in your dashboard. Over 60 mobile money payment methods are available, covering all West African countries.

security.question: Is my data secure with Facturly?
security.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-level security measures including end-to-end encryption, secure data transmission (HTTPS/TLS) and compliance with industry standards. Your financial data is protected and never shared without your explicit authorization. We take security very seriously.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about credits
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our packs and credits

howCreditsWork.question: How do credits work?
howCreditsWork.answer: 1 credit = 1 invoice sent (via WhatsApp or email). You buy credits individually or in packs. Credits remain valid until used. No subscription, no commitment.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: Payment via mobile money: Orange Money, MTN, Wave, Moov Money, Airtel Money, T-Money, etc. Payments are secure and credits are added instantly after validation.

noExpiration.question: Do credits expire?
noExpiration.answer: No. Your credits remain valid as long as they are not used. No expiration date.

refund.question: What is your refund policy?
refund.answer: If you have a problem with a purchase, contact our support. We review each case and may refund unused credits if necessary.

mobileMoney.title: Mobile Money integrated
mobileMoney.description: Orange Money, MTN, Wave and 60+ payment methods. Receive payments instantly, even without a bank account. Perfect for Africa where mobile money is king.

africa.title: 100% adapted to Africa
africa.description: Local currencies (XOF, XAF, NGN, GHS), country-specific taxes, and designed for West African market realities. No generic solution, but one that understands you.

speed.title: 60 seconds flat
speed.description: Create and send your invoices in less than a minute. No more hours wasted with Excel or Word. More time to grow your business.

security.title: Enterprise-level security
security.description: Your financial data is protected and encrypted. Compliant with international standards. Your invoices and payments are secure.

growth.title: Grow your business

testimonials.title: Mobile-first invoicing for Africa
testimonials.subtitle: Discover how our clients create their invoices in 60 seconds
testimonials.subtitle2: and get paid quickly via mobile money

large.quote: Facturly has revolutionized the way we invoice. In Ivory Coast, where mobile money is king, being able to send invoices via WhatsApp and receive payments via Orange Money in just a few hours is a game changer. Our clients love it!
large.name: Amadou Traoré

items.quote: Before Facturly, I wasted hours creating invoices in Word. Now, in 60 seconds, I send a professional invoice via WhatsApp to my clients in Senegal. And the best part? They pay directly with Wave or Orange Money. It's magical!
items.name: Fatou Diop

items.quote: As a freelancer in Mali, I struggled to get paid. With Facturly, my clients receive invoices on WhatsApp and pay instantly with their mobile money. My collection rate has increased by 80%!
items.name: Ibrahim Traoré

items.quote: Our SME in Burkina Faso now invoices 200+ clients per month. Facturly saves us 15 hours per week. The dashboard shows us in real-time who has paid and who needs to be reminded. Essential!
items.name: Aminata Ouédraogo

items.quote: What convinced me? French support and the fact that everything is adapted to Africa. XOF, XAF currencies, local taxes, and especially integrated mobile money. Finally a solution that understands us!
items.name: Koffi Adjo

items.quote: I tested several invoicing solutions, but none were adapted to the Ivorian market. Facturly understands our needs: WhatsApp to communicate, mobile money to pay. It's exactly what we needed.
items.name: Marie Kouassi

items.quote: As an architect in Benin, I invoice complex projects. Facturly perfectly handles local currencies, taxes, and especially payment tracking. My clients now pay in 48h instead of 2 weeks!
items.name: Jean-Baptiste Sènou

items.quote: Our startup in Ghana has been using Facturly for 6 months. The time savings are huge, but most importantly, our clients love receiving invoices on WhatsApp and paying with MTN Mobile Money. It's become a competitive advantage!
items.name: Kwame Mensah

items.quote: As a consultant in Douala, I invoice clients in Cameroon and Gabon. Facturly handles FCFA (XAF) and MTN/Orange mobile money perfectly. The tool crosses CEMAC borders.
items.name: Jean Mballa

footer.tagline: The Fintech simplifying financial management for entrepreneurs in Africa.
footer.lomeAnchor: Based in Lomé, at the heart of West African finance.

pricing.title: Credits for your invoices
pricing.subtitle: Buy credits individually or in packs. 1 credit = 1 invoice sent. Pay via mobile money.
pricing.trustMessage: Free to create invoices. Pay only for sending (1 credit = 1 invoice). No subscription. Pay via Orange Money, MTN, Wave.

metadata.title: Pricing - Facturly | Credits and packs for invoicing
metadata.description: Buy credits to send your invoices. Starter, Pro and Business packs. Mobile money payment.

comparison.title: Pack comparison
comparison.subtitle: The more credits you buy, the lower the unit price

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about credits
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our packs and credits

howCreditsWork.question: How do credits work?
howCreditsWork.answer: 1 credit = 1 invoice sent (via WhatsApp or email). You buy credits individually or in packs. Credits remain valid until used. No subscription, no commitment.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: Payment via mobile money: Orange Money, MTN, Wave, Moov Money, Airtel Money, T-Money, etc. Payments are secure and credits are added instantly after validation.

noExpiration.question: Do credits expire?
noExpiration.answer: No. Your credits remain valid as long as they are not used. No expiration date.

refund.question: What is your refund policy?
refund.answer: If you have a problem with a purchase, contact our support. We review each case and may refund unused credits if necessary.

metadata.title: Facturly - Mobile-first Invoicing for Africa
metadata.description: Create and send your invoices in 60 seconds, pay with mobile money. Mobile-first invoicing platform for West Africa with WhatsApp and 60+ mobile money payment methods.
metadata.landingTitle: Create and send your invoices in 60 seconds, pay with mobile money
metadata.landingDescription: Facturly is the mobile-first invoicing Fintech for Africa. Create your invoices in 60 seconds, send them via WhatsApp, and receive payments via Orange Money, MTN, Wave and 60+ local methods.
metadata.organizationDescription: Mobile-first invoicing platform for West Africa

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: From creating your invoice to receiving funds, discover the complete process in 4 simple steps.

metadata.title: How it works - Facturly
metadata.description: Create invoices, send them via WhatsApp, receive payments via mobile money. Discover the Facturly process in 4 steps.

step1.title: Creation & Customization
step1.description:
Enter your products or services, local taxes and your business information. Customize your invoice in a few clicks.

The generated invoices are professional and compliant with local currencies (XOF, XAF, GHS, NGN, etc.).

step2.title: WhatsApp Sending
step2.description:
Once the invoice is generated, a button allows you to send it directly to your client's WhatsApp.

No lost emails, no delays. Your client receives the invoice instantly where they already communicate.

step3.title: Payment (client side)
step3.description:
Your client clicks on the secure link received.

They choose their payment method (Wave, Orange Money, MTN, etc.), confirm on their phone with their usual PIN. Simple and familiar for them.

step4.title: Receiving Funds
step4.description:
Funds are collected via our certified payment partner (Moneroo).

You can request a transfer of your balance to your own Mobile Money or bank account. Withdrawals are processed within 24 to 48 business hours.
step4.extra: Facturly does not store any bank information or PIN codes of your clients.

security.title: Fund security
security.description: Your payments are processed by Moneroo, a certified payment intermediary. Facturly does not store any sensitive banking data. Funds flow through secure and compliant channels.

metadata.title: Legal Notice - Facturly
metadata.description: Legal information about the Facturly service.

publisher.title: 1. Service publisher
publisher.content: The facturly.online website is published by Devone Company, based in Lomé (Togo). Contact: support@facturly.online

hosting.title: 2. Hosting
hosting.content: The website is hosted by Vercel Inc., 440 N Barranca Ave #4133, Covina, CA 91723, USA.

payment.title: 3. Payment partner
payment.content: Payment services are provided by the Moneroo platform, a certified payment intermediary. Facturly does not store any bank information or user PIN codes.

introduction.title: 1. Welcome to Facturly
introduction.content:
Thanks for using Facturly! By accessing our platform, you're joining a community of entrepreneurs simplifying their management. By using our services, you agree to these common-sense rules that help us protect everyone.

Facturly is operated by Devone Company, based in Lomé (Togo). Our relationship is governed by Togolese law and OHADA standards, ensuring transparency for your transactions within the Franc Zone.

acceptance.title: 2. What to know before you start
acceptance.content: By creating your account, you simply confirm that:

items.1: You are an adult (18 years or older)
items.2: You have the right to represent your business or activity
items.3: You will use the tool honestly and legally

service.title: 3. What Facturly does for you
service.content: Our mission is to save you time. With Facturly, you can:

features.2: Track your payments without chasing clients
features.3: Manage your product catalogs and address book
features.4: Visualize your business health with simple reports
features.5: Access advanced tools according to your needs (credit system)

accounts.title: 4. Your account, your responsibility
accounts.content: For everything to work smoothly, we count on you to:

responsibilities.1: Keep your access secret (don't share your password)
responsibilities.2: Take responsibility for actions made from your account
responsibilities.3: Give us true info for your invoices (it's for your credibility!)
responsibilities.4: Let us know if you think someone else is using your account

payment.title: 5. Payments and Credits
payment.content: Facturly works without hidden subscriptions. You pay for what you use:

terms.1: Credit pack purchases are made in advance
terms.2: Prices are transparent and displayed before each purchase
terms.3: A credit used to send an invoice is final
terms.4: Your credits don't expire as long as your account is active

intellectual.title: 6. Ownership and respect
intellectual.content: The Facturly interface, logo, and technology belong to us. We give you the right to use them for your business, but you cannot copy or resell them as your own.

liability.title: 7. Liability limits
liability.content: We do everything to keep Facturly available 24/7, but we cannot guarantee the total absence of bugs or outages (especially network-related). Facturly is a management aid tool; you remain solely responsible for the accounting and tax compliance of your invoices.

termination.title: 8. End of the adventure
termination.content: You can stop using Facturly whenever you want. On our side, we might suspend an account in case of clear fraud or harmful behavior to the platform.

changes.title: 9. Evolutions
changes.content: The world changes, Facturly too. If we modify these rules, we'll update this page. Continuing to use the app after an update means you agree with the new rules.

contact.title: 10. Let's talk
contact.content: A question? A doubt? Write to us, we're here to help:

privacy.title: Your Privacy
privacy.description: How we protect your data at Facturly
privacy.dataController: Responsible: Devone Company, registered at RCCM Lomé under number TG-LOM 2026 A 001 (Lomé, Togo)

introduction.title: 1. We respect your privacy
introduction.content: At Facturly, we know your business data is precious. This page explains transparently what we collect and why. No useless jargon, just the truth about your data.

googleData.title: 2. Specific Section: Google API Services Usage
googleData.content: This section complements our commitments for users signing in via Google.

scopes.title: Data Collected (Scopes)
scopes.content: By using Google Sign-in, Facturly accesses exclusively your public profile information (name, photo) and your email address (Scopes: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo.profile and https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo.email).

usage.title: Limited Use
usage.content: The use of this information is strictly limited to creating your account and personalizing your invoices. We strictly comply with the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the "Limited Use" requirements.

sharing.title: No Transfer
sharing.content: No data from Google is transferred to third parties, unless strictly necessary to provide the application's features or to comply with applicable laws.

ai.title: AI and Advertising
ai.content: We certify that Google data is never used for advertising purposes, nor for training machine learning models (AI/Machine Learning).

retention.title: Deletion
retention.content: Your data stays with us as long as you use the app. If you want to delete everything, send a quick email to support@facturly.online and we'll erase everything within 48h.

collection.title: 3. What we keep in mind
collection.content: To serve you, we need some info:

types.3: Your invoices and clients (so you can find them)
types.4: Some technical info (your IP) to secure your connections

purposes.1: So you can create and send your invoices
purposes.2: To process your mobile money payments
purposes.3: To notify you when a client has paid you
purposes.4: To improve the tool based on your feedback

sharing.title: 6. No resale
sharing.content: We will NEVER sell your data. Period. We share it only with essential services (payment, hosting) for Facturly to run.

rights.title: 7. You're the boss
rights.content: It's your data, you have all the rights: see what we have on you, correct an error, or ask us to delete everything.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.content: We use small files (cookies) just so you don't have to sign in every time and to understand how people use the site.

thirdParty.title: 9. Our partners
thirdParty.content: We work with serious people like Moneroo for payments or Google for visit stats. They have their own rules, but we chose them because they are reliable.

applicableLaw.title: 10. Applicable Law
applicableLaw.content: This policy is governed by Law No. 2019-014 on the protection of personal data in Togo.

contact.title: 11. Let's stay in touch
contact.content: Need to delete your data or just want to talk security? Write to us or visit us:
contact.address: Address: Administrative District, Rue des Hydrocarbures, Lomé, Togo

messageStyles.helperText: Choose the tone of your WhatsApp messages based on your client type

professionalWarm.label: Professional & Warm
professionalWarm.description: A professional tone with a human touch, perfect for maintaining trust and a strong client relationship.

direct.label: Direct
direct.description: Clear, concise, and straight to the point. Ideal for encouraging quick payments.

premium.label: Premium
premium.description: A formal and structured tone, well suited for corporate clients and established business relationships.

humane.label: Human

compact.label: Compact
compact.description: Short and minimal. Perfect for WhatsApp or quick message exchanges.
